definitions.definition: A town in La'ilay Maychew district, Maekelay , Tigray , Ethiopia : The site of the historic capital of the Aksumite Empire, now a tourist town in Ethiopia .

main_definition: A town in La'ilay Maychew district, Maekelay , Tigray , Ethiopia : The site of the historic capital of the Aksumite Empire, now a tourist town in Ethiopia .
